name: Craft Essence Bib Shorts - Men's
description:
From weekend tours, to club rides, to those solo recharge rides, these refined cycling bib shorts use recycled material to keep you comfy during long hours in the saddle. The Essence bibs keep it simple, so you can put the hammer down knowing your shorts are staying right where you want them.Lycra® Sport Energy compression fabric reduces muscle fatigue.Recycled nylon blend has a supple 4-way stretch.Breathable mesh upper helps wick away moisture.UPF50+ shorts block more than 98% of UV.Infinity C3 chamois with high-density foam provides comfort on longer rides.Silicone leg grippers hold hems in place.Reflective detailing for visibility on low-light rides.

        Sustainability
